titleStmt.title: SII 8.50: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 50. (A.R. No. 462 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME PRAKARA.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ AvaṉiĀḷappiṟantārāṉa śrīkopperuñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu muṉṟāvatu ḷ 3 100 2 10 5ṉāl taṉiyūr perumpaṟṟappuliyūr mulaparuṣaiyār Eḻuttu . nammur nilakkaṇakku taṉmapiriyaṉum
tillaimuvāyiraveḷāṉum kaṇṭu Uṭaiyār tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār cāttiAruḷa Aracūruṭaiyār ceṅkaṉivāyarāṉa piḷḷai coḻakoṉār Āḷiyār tirunantavaṉamākac ceyyak koṇṭu viṭṭa Ivvūr melpiṭṭākai kaṅkaikoṇ
ṭacoḻapperiḷamaināṭṭu Iruntacceriyāṉa caṇṭeśvaranallūrppāl śrīcuntaracoḻavatikku meṟku śrīcoḻakulacuntarivāykkālukkut teṟku 3 4catirattu vācciyaṉ nakkaṉ tiruñāṉacampantaṉpakkal koṇṭu viṭṭa
4 + � + 3/80 + 1/160 + 1/320 x 3/4 + 1/320ṉāl maṭakku 1/80 + 1/160 + � + 1/40m vācciyaṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ dabhrasabhāpatiyum Ivaṉ tampi tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ tevakaḷtevaṉumpakkal vilaikoṇṭa nilamāy vācciyaṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ
pañcavaṉ prahmamārāyarperil kuṟaitta nilam mukkāṇi Araikkāṇikkiḻ muṉṟu mā mukkāṇiyiṉāl maṭakkunilam 1/320 x 1/2m Uṭaiyār tiruppuliśvaramuṭaiyār tirunāmattukkāṇiyāyp parivattaṉaiyāṟ pukunta Iṣapatevaviḷākameṉṟu peru
ṭaiya nilattu m 1/4 + 1/20 + 1/80 + 1/320 + 1/320 x 1/4 + 4 + � + 1/80 + 1/160 ṉāl maṭakku 1/20 + 1/80 + 1/320 + 1/320 x 3/4m Uṭaiyār tiruppuliśvaramuṭaiyār tirunantavaṉattu Uṭkkiṭaiyāy Akappaṭa palavaravai niṟṟamutu caṅkaṭuvāṉukku Acceric cāttaṅkuṭiyi laṭaippāṉa nilattālk kuḻi Eṇpatte
ḻe mukkāle Oru māvukkut talaimāṟu Iccaṇṭeśvaranallūr Iṣapatevarviḷākattup parivattaṉaiyāyp pukunta kuḻi 8 10 7 + 3/4 + 1/20ṉāl Ūrppaṭi 1/40 + 1/160 + 1/320 x 1/320ṉāl maṭakku 1/320 x 3/20 vum Āka Uṭaiyār tiruppuliśvaramuṭaiyār tirunāmattukkāṇiy pa
rivattaṉaiyāy pukunta 1/4sa 1/320 x 3/80 + 1/80 + 1/160ṉāl maṭakku 1/320 + 1/320 x 3/4 + 3/20vum Āka 1/2 + 3/20 + 1/80 + 1/320 + 1/320 x 1/2 + 1/40 + 1/160ṉāl maṭakku 1/80 + 1/320 x 1/4 + 4 + � + 1/40 Innilam 1/2 + 3/16 + 1/80 + 1/320 + 1/320 x 1/2 + 1/40 + 1/160ṉāl maṭakku 1/80 + 1/320 x 1/4 + 4 + � + 1/40yum Ipperarkaḷilk kuṟaittu
muṉṟāvatu pacāṉmutal Ūrkkī ḻiṟaiyiliyāka Ūrmāvinta kaṭamai kuṭimai nellarici payaṟu Uṭpaṭṭa kaṭamaikaḷ tavirntu Ūrk kiḻiṟaiyiliyāka Immaṭakkuk kaḻittu Ūril nikkiṉiṉṟa maṭakkile viḻukkā ṭiṭṭukkoḷḷak kaṭavutākappaṇṇuvate . Ip
paṭi ceyyakkaṭavutākac coṉṉom . Ivai Aruḷāl Ūrkkaṇakkut tiruvuṭaiantaṇappiriyaṉ Eḻuttu mulaparuṣaiyār Eḻuti Eḻuttiṭṭa niyokappaṭi kal veṭṭiyatu .
Digital edition of SII 8.50 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
